Author: elitecstrike
Title: [ANN] CRYPTOFORECAST [CFT] ♦Anticipating the financial market is now possible♦
Body: Cryptoforecast: Where is the value? https://medium.com/@Forecasts/cryptoforecast-where-is-the-value-a59f55b0f5b5  Every user who wants to analyze crypto market has a costant issue: researching market data, marketcap classifications, volumes, crypto projects clustering, or any other data.  An increasing number of platforms connect via API to other sites that in many cases report inefficient data and calculated in a very superficial way. By this way, this inefficiency is reflected on a major part of analysis and information sites. There is also another great problem: Whether you talk about volatility, about correlation between different cryptos, about market and volumes indexes, it remains in fact that we need to jump as crickets between one site and another to have information at 360 degrees. Our aim is to put order in all this.  Cryptoforecast will work to carry all those information managing this amount of data in a single point. Our webapp will be the real time data platform where you will be able to find all the information you need of to monitor your portfolio and all the market, select the most interesting crypto, analyze price with some different forecasting algorithms.  For example, we are also developing specific tools for allowing users to track crypto stakes held on various exchange and evaluate them also by a fiscal point of view, at least for what current legislation allows to analyze. We care about our users and we perfectly know how is difficult to hold a reliable track of movements on exchanges. We will also develop many service by using API connection with exchanges. Another very ambitious tool, that is still in an early development phase, is coinmap: an analysis tool for mapping all cryptos that will aggregate coins with similar characteristics, for example distinctive technological elements, ROI, Governance, Algorithm, function / destination of use (a market-oriented selection) and many other criteria. All these functions will be added to our service in the next months.  In addition to what has been said, our team is working on some forecasting algorithms. One of these, already operative, is the Forecast, based on some seasonality patterns already observed also in traditional market, that has experienced some very important improvements. Another great project is cryptolearning, fork of pillar algorithm, that reworks many seasonal-based forecasting algorithms already existing in traditional markets. We are also working on an internal marketcap for our user, that will allow to conduct some more selective analysis.  Cryptoforecast’s proposition of value consists in having a complete app that ranges from the single quotation of a coin, to tax report and fiscal analysis, that you will be able to request while trading via api directly on our platform. All these services will be united with the forecasting algorithms specified above.  Of course, synthesizing moths of planned development is very difficult: this is only a part of the work that we are doing to improve and make grow cryptoforecast project. It will be a long road for development. But this is a road that we are already going in, and you will have a first light on this with the new webapp, that is coming. Stay turned!

Author: fishervwb
Title: [ANN] CRYPTOFORECAST [CFT] ♦Anticipating the financial market is now possible♦
Body: The importance of Security in the new WebApp  As we already know Cryptoforecast is a system for predicting market trends on major crypto and the old WebApp is reasonably safe.  However, we are developing so many userful functions for the trader that also contain “sensitive” data, so it’s also imperative to rebuild from scratch all the security system of login and authentication.   In the crypto world, security is a must because in the end it contains financial data, wealth and so on. In a scenario where technicians are very present it becomes absolutely necessary to implement new security standards that can be secure and scalable.  This part, called jokingly “Zenigata”, manage the communication between the modules that compose Cryptoforecast releasing of tokens that allow to recognize “read and write” permissions between the various modules using the APIs available from the same WebApp. Security standards obviously implements 2FA through the services of Google authenticator HOTP in order to allow user’s first access to the system, IP filtering and rate limit on IP. Since DDOS attacks are increasing greatly, so in Zenigata we have installed a port control to decrease the attack surface and finally we implement everything through Json Web Tokens (JWT). This new technology allows fast and secure Single Sign-On Access and allows you to logically separate the modules that make up the app. JWT also allows you to encrypt any data exchanged from the server to the client and vice versa.  It’s hard to go into detail on what kind of solution we’ve put in the field. We can only say that the Team is working a lot on security related aspect. There are many data to be protected in in the Trading Control Room.. what exactly is the Trading Control Room?  https://medium.com/@Forecasts/the-importance-of-security-in-the-new-webapp-105e4b777aa0

Available for every type of market, and respecting the characteristics of the user/trader, the platform offers a column on which to build your trading strategy, both with ethereum – or rather, the ether – which, with other criptovalute as bitcoin. How does the trading Ethereum  Cryptoforecast is not intended to replace the market analysis related to resistance, supports, oscillators and averages, but arises as a natural compendium, a tool that can be used as a basis for any decision such as predictive analytics, with the aim to anticipate the market. Through the use of this specific algorithm, in fact, Cryptoforecats manages to be a scalable tool, and to provide an approximate indication of the trend, approaching as much as possible to the reality of the market. Author: Dabs
Title: [ANN] CRYPTOFORECAST [CFT] ♦Anticipating the financial market is now possible♦
Body: To clarify: every single address in the list is held under escrow with a single person that is me. I've done the same for a few other altcoin ICOs, and sometimes I'm the sole escrow. The funds are then forwarded to the multi-sig address held by me and SebastianJu, also another escrow.  Many investors do not send from addresses where they have the private keys (like an exchange or a web or online wallet). Many others that do send from a wallet where they have the private keys do not know how to sign a message.  This method is more convenient for the people (and actually more work for the escrow handling the job.)  A lot of other ICOs that had multi-sig escrow are handled similarly.  Again, please confirm that your deposit address is in the list before sending.  Anyone who sends directly to the multi-sig address will have to wait until AFTER the crowdfund before his investment can be credited, after verifying that they indeed sent it, with blockchain proof. That's less convenient for the investor, and they risk getting their CFT later than everyone else.

Body: The main difference between gnosis and Augur is the way event resolving works. Augur uses a reputation token system (REPS). Anyone who owns tokens can participate in the voting process to select the correct outcome. Those who vote for the correct choice are rewarded. In contrast, Gnosis can work with any kind of oracle which functions as automated program able to decide certain decision problems in a single operation. It runs on fact server which relies on gnosis as third party to resolve events and on the other cryptoforecast is an application based on an algorithm called pillar developed for traders and developers, to forecast the future movement of BTC or other cryptourrencies.
